Our Mission
Our mission at the resort is to provide a haven of relaxation and recreation, offering exceptional hospitality, immersive experiences, and a memorable escape for our guests. We strive to create a harmonious blend of natural beauty, top-notch amenities, and personalized service to ensure a delightful and rejuvenating stay for every visitor.

History
Pantukan Water World is a perfect place for beach lovers as this beach resort offers various beach activities such as kayaking, kite boarding, banana boat rides, etc. Accommodations will surely suit your modern taste. Their breathtaking long deck can capture the perfect sunset you've all dreamed of. Traveling can be an exhausting experience. Enter Pantukan Water World, where style, comfort and hospitality meet. Our commitment to service is incomparable and our fares are unmatched. Take a look at our site to find out more about our rooms, food and special events, or check out the services that we offer. From Tagum City, you can ride a bus for 45 minutes. ride to Pantukan and stop at Pantukan Water World, where there is a signboard referring to the resort.
